hero.title: DESIGN AND ARCHITECTURE STUDIO
hero.description: We create architecture and interiors that inspire and make life more comfortable

about.title: About Us
about.description1: We are an architectural studio where creativity and functionality merge to create spaces that inspire and transform everyday life.
about.description2: We focus on developing solutions for residential and commercial properties that are not only aesthetically appealing but also practical. Our team of professionals strives for excellence in every project.
about.description3: Each project is a unique journey that begins with understanding your needs and ends with creating a space that exceeds your expectations.

creativePath.title: Creative Journey
creativePath.name: Dmitry Arkadyevich Kefkhayants
creativePath.description1: I was born in 1988 in Tashkent. In 2005, I graduated from school and enrolled in TASI in the Faculty of Architectural Environment Design. I graduated from the institute in 2009 with one of the highest scores.
creativePath.description2: In 2008, I won first place at the International Architectural Competition MACCA - 1st place (diploma) in Minsk, Belarus.
creativePath.description3: I revealed my charisma and talent in 2006 when I first performed on stage. By winning first place in 2008, I became well-known in professional circles.
creativePath.description4: In 2009, after winning an international competition, I gained recognition not only in Russia but also abroad.
creativePath.description5: In 2010, I became a jury member at international competitions, and in 2012, I served as the chief judge at the World Championship.
creativePath.description6: Today, I continue to inspire millions of people worldwide by sharing my experience and knowledge.
creativePath.description7: I received my first job and project in 2009 at the age of 21, and since then, I have been dedicated solely to architecture and design.
creativePath.description8: 2023 to present: Architectural company LLC 'Niiat', Tashkent, Uzbekistan. Position – Chief Architect.
creativePath.description9: 2022: 'Enter Engineering' company, Head of Civil Construction and VZiSOV. 2019-2021: LLC 'Epsilon Development Company', Tashkent/Karshi region. Position - Head of Architectural-Construction Group / Chief Project Engineer.
creativePath.description10: June 2017 - September 2019: Architectural company LLC 'Niiat', Tashkent, Uzbekistan. Position – Chief Architect. January 2015 - March 2017: LLC '
creativePath.description01: Currently, I have founded my own architecture and design studio to realize all the experience and potential accumulated over the years.

projects.title: Architectural Projects
projects.description: We create architecture that harmoniously combines aesthetics, functionality, and innovative technologies. Our studio’s portfolio includes unique residential, commercial, and public space projects designed with modern trends and our clients’ individual needs in mind.

items.name: Modern Residential Complex
items.short_description: A modern residential complex with sustainable design.
items.description:
This project incorporates innovative architectural solutions.
It prioritizes eco-friendly materials and energy efficiency.

items.name: Commercial Hub
items.short_description: A dynamic commercial space for businesses.
items.description:
Designed for functionality and aesthetics.
Includes modern technologies for smart operations.

items.title: Innovative Architectural Trends
items.description: An article exploring the latest trends in sustainable architecture.

items.title: Design of the Future
items.description: An article about our studio’s approach to modern design.

design.title: Interior Design
design.description: We create interiors that reflect our clients’ style, character, and lifestyle. In our work, we combine aesthetics, functionality, and modern technologies to make each project unique and comfortable.

items.name: Luxury Apartment
items.description:
Exquisite interior design for a modern apartment.
Uses high-quality materials and smart home technologies.

items.name: Cozy Villa
items.description:
A warm and inviting villa interior.
Designed for comfort and elegance.

contacts.title: Contact Us
contacts.description: Have questions? Want to learn more about our services? Write to us using the form below, and we will get back to you as soon as possible.
